title: Drax
summaries: The Drax is a drill and axe combination which can be crafted after all three mechanical bosses have been defeated. It is able to mine any block other than Lihzahrd Bricks.

On the <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the Drax can be found in <linked>Shadow Chests</linked> in <linked>The Underworld</linked>, making it available <linked>pre-Hardmode</linked>.
The counterpart of the Drax is the <linked>Pickaxe Axe</linked>, which is slightly slower than the Drax but does not have a -1 range penalty.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
